alert.note: Alert for Hennepin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 6:30PM CDT until July 19 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Hennepin County in east central Minnesota... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 630 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Corcoran, or 12 miles southeast of Buffalo, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Maple Grove around 635 PM CDT. Orono and Medina around 640 PM CDT. Plymouth and Wayzata around 645 PM CDT. Minnetonka and Brooklyn Center around 650 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Golden Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
